settings.name: Model
settings.description: The GPT-family model you want to use.

settings.name: Context Size
settings.description: The max context size your model supports.

settings.name: System Message
settings.description: A message to help instruct the model on it's usage and how to behave.
settings.default: You are a helpful AI assistant.

settings.name: API Key
settings.description: API access key. If using OpenAI, get yours from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

settings.name: URL Base
settings.description: OpenAI API URL base. Good for connecting to other compatible APIs as well.

settings.name: Completion Model Override
settings.description: Will overwrite the model selection above. Any LiteLLM model provider is available: https://docs.litellm.ai/docs/providers . For example, `mistral/mistral-tiny`.

settings.name: Simple Model Override
settings.description: Used for miscellaneous tasks like titling threads for lower cost. Any LiteLLM model provider is available: https://docs.litellm.ai/docs/providers

settings.name: Organization ID
settings.description: Used by some vendors to identify the organization using the API.

settings.name: API Version
settings.description: Used by some vendors to identify the API to use.

settings.name: Temperature
settings.description: Temperature as a setting that controls the AI's willingness to take risks in its word choices. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic. (Between 0.0 to 2.0)

settings.name: Top P
settings.description: Top P controls the diversity of the AI's responses by only considering a subset of all possible next words that have a cumulative probability above a certain threshold. Recommended to use Temperature OR Top-P, not both. (Between 0.0 to 2.0)

settings.name: Stop Sequence
settings.description: Sequence where if generated the API will stop generating further tokens.

settings.name: Presence Penalty
settings.description: Aims to reduce the likelihood of the model repeating the same information or topics it has already mentioned in the current text generation task. (Between -2.0 to 2.0)

settings.name: Frequency Penalty
settings.description: Aims to decrease the repetition of individual words or phrases within the generated text. (Between -2.0 to 2.0)
